hero.title: Interviewing Resources
hero.subTitle: We Know Interviewing Can Be Difficult, That's Why We're Here To Help You Along The Way

discover.title: Explore the Interviewing Resources Our Team Provides:
discover.subTitle: Know What To Say and How To Explain It

blocks.title: Common Interview Questions
blocks.content: Explore some of the most common questions asked in an interview.

blocks.title: Posture, Eye Contact and Hand Gestures
blocks.content: It is important to present yourself in a professional manner, take a look at some of the helpful resources we recommend.

blocks.title: Confident Responses
blocks.content: Confidence is key to succeeding in your career. Explore the resources our team has compiled to ensure your confidence isn't what is holding you back from the career growth you desire.

blocks.title: Knowing Your Resume
blocks.content: It is important to know Information listed on your resume and how to respond to questions regarding your experience. Take a look at some of the recommendations we have for helping you follow up questions about specific sections of your resume.

blocks.title: Things To Avoid Saying Or Doing When Interviewing
blocks.content: We recommend that individuals avoid saying these things during an interview. Hiring managers and people listening to you say interviewers who avoid these habits provide a more enjoyable expereince.

blocks.title: How To Emphasize Your Best Skills While Interviewing
blocks.content: Lets talk about the ways you help  bring out the best in you. Explore the steps and recommendations our team has compiled to help bring out core strengths skill-sets during an interview.

blocks.title: What Qualities Stand Out To Hiring Managers?
blocks.content: Some qualities and traits are important and stand out during the interview process. Take a look at what qualities we believe stand out to hiring managers.

popular.title: Practice Interactive Interviews and Presentations
popular.subTitle: Don't Let Nerves Hold You Back From Your Success!

bottomBlock.title: Start Using Sail Today
bottomBlock.subTitle: Apply One Swipe At A Time
bottomBlock.content: Sail is the convenient way to find & apply for job opportunities around the world.
